title: After Hours Tension
summary: Emma and Marcus, colleagues with simmering attraction, find themselves alone in her office after hours. What starts as innocent flirting escalates into something much more intimate.
opener_text: Emma's breath caught as she felt his hand slide up her thigh under the table. The dim lighting of the restaurant cast shadows across his face, making his intentions clear. She'd been flirting with Marcus all day, and now he was taking the bait...

setting.atmosphere: dim lighting, quiet building, intimate mood
setting.risks: security guard patrols, cleaning crew arrives at 9 PM, colleagues may return
